title: Name Change//Region Change being free
body:
well since it wasnt me who made my user in the first place i didnt like it so yh...
my usual user is mrevilmexican so yh...
but then the name change costs a ton of money.
well at least more than it should be... THEN i made another account whose user IS MrEvilMexican but then i accudentally made the region NA and well, accidents happen. dammit riot MAKE THE TRANSFER AND NAME CHANGE FREE U GET ENOUGH MONEY FROM THE SKINS D{:<
or at least cheaper DX< PPPPPLLLLLSSSSS RIOT

replies.body: i dont think this is a good idea tbh. Too many people will be changing server all the time.

You need to redo this debate, Because you have a  yes for cheaper or free and no for don't do it should be:

Yes (Cheaper.)
Yes (Free.)
No (Don't change a thing.)
